it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Carmelo Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said. "You win games with stops more than making shots. advertising that[ "American Idol'] isn't going to be as mean, they might be losing their professional credibility," says Robert Thompson, a professor of television and pop culture at Syracuse University. It's not as meaningful to get a compliment from someone who's always nice. In past seasons, you'd see people running out of the[ judging] room saying,` Simon Cowell loved me!' Simon Cowell was always the one people cared about, because he was the hardest one to get. Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn"t work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler .
